body:
The reason is at

https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/7b4fe3d25c01576636985320ebf16393cd21c13c/buffer/src/main/java/io/netty/buffer/AdaptivePoolingAllocator.java#L151-L155

It's to avoid `Magazine`s leaks, hence the `Magazine` is not added to the list of `live` ones, which are used for memory usage.
Since it's not nice they will "disappear" for telemetry, let's think about another option:
1. always use soft reference to the live magazines, in case the fast thread local thread cannot clean up itself.
2. create a new `MemoryCounters` class used within `Magazine` and just pass the `MemoryCounter`s  instead of storing the `Magazine`s; it will avoid the leak, but can still cause OOM since none is going to remove it when the owner `Magazine` is collected (if ever)

Another qq question:
Are you enabling `-Dio.netty.allocator.useCachedMagazinesForNonEventLoopThreads=true`?

> Are you enabling -Dio.netty.allocator.useCachedMagazinesForNonEventLoopThreads=true? 

Yes, I did it by setting the second param to be `true`:
`alloc[0] = new AdaptiveByteBufAllocator(false, true);`
OK, PR is on the way...

issue.title: `AdaptiveByteBufAllocator` will not use threadlocal magazine if `FastThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals()` returns false

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Motivation:

The method `AdaptiveByteBufAllocator.usedHeapMemory()` does not return a correct value when `FastThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals(Thread.currentThread()) == false` by using a customized  `FastThreadLocalThread` thread.

Modification:

If `FastThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals(Thread.currentThread()) == false`, then we will NOT use threadLocal magazine.

Result:

Fixes #14483.

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
â€¦ThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals()` returns false (#14486)

Motivation:

The method `AdaptiveByteBufAllocator.usedHeapMemory()` does not return a correct value when
`FastThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals(Thread.currentThread()) == false` by using a customized `FastThreadLocalThread` thread.

Modification:

If
`FastThreadLocalThread.willCleanupFastThreadLocals(Thread.currentThread()) == false`, then we will NOT use threadLocal magazine.

Result:

Fixes #14483.
